title: $VEGA TOKEN
Use the Ethereum wallet you want to send: Connect to the Ethereum wallet that holds your $VEGA tokens to see what can be redeemed from <trancheLink>vesting tranches</trancheLink>. To redeem tokens you will need some ETH to pay gas fees.
You can associate tokens while they are: You can associate tokens while they are held in the vesting contract, when they unlock you will need to disassociate them before they can be redeemed.
Vega key {{vegaKey}} can now participate: Vega key {{vegaKey}} can now participate in governance and nominate a validator with your associated $VEGA.
stakingStep2Text: Your tokens need to be associated with a Vega wallet so that you can control your stake
stakingStep3: Step 3. Select the validator you'd like to nominate
stakeAddSuccessMessage: In some cases your actual nominated stake will be lower than intended. This happens when the validator is oversubscribed. The actual nominated amount will be calculated at the start of the next epoch.
How much to Add in next epoch?: How much to add in next epoch?
Want to remove your stake before the epo: Want to remove your stake when the epoch ends?
Want to remove your stake at the end of: Want to remove your stake now?
Switch to form for removal at end of epo: Switch to remove at end of epoch
